channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Zstandard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Zstandard

item.title: CVE-2021-24032|2024-08-03T19:21:17.115Z -- facebook -- zstandard
item.description: Beginning in v1.4.1 and prior to v1.4.9, due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-24031, the Zstandard command-line utility created output files with default permissions and restricted those permissions immediately afterwards. Output files could therefore momentarily be readable or writable to unintended parties.

item.title: CVE-2021-24031|2024-08-03T19:21:17.205Z -- facebook -- zstandard
item.description: In the Zstandard command-line utility prior to v1.4.1, output files were created with default permissions. Correct file permissions (matching the input) would only be set at completion time. Output files could therefore be readable or writable to unintended parties.
